scripts.start: concurrently "npm --workspace component run deploy" "npm --workspace auth run deploy" "npm --workspace customers run deploy" "npm --workspace dashboard run deploy" "npm --workspace cases run deploy" "npm --workspace activities run deploy" "npm --workspace request run deploy" "npm --workspace knowledgearticle run deploy" "npm --workspace services run deploy" "npm --workspace settings run deploy" "npm --workspace ccms run deploy" "npm --workspace casestructure run deploy"  "npm --workspace usermanagement run deploy"  "npm --workspace gensettings run deploy" "npm --workspace container run deploy"
scripts.watch:component: nodemon --watch component/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace component run deploy"
scripts.watch:component.local: nodemon --watch component/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace component run deploy:local"
scripts.watch:auth: nodemon --watch auth/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace auth run deploy"
scripts.watch:auth.local: nodemon --watch auth/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace auth run deploy:local"
scripts.watch:customers: nodemon --watch customers/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace customers run deploy"
scripts.watch:customers.local: nodemon --watch customers/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace customers run deploy:local"
scripts.watch:dashboard: nodemon --watch dashboard/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace dashboard run deploy"
scripts.watch:dashboard.local: nodemon --watch dashboard/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace dashboard run deploy:local"
scripts.watch:cases: nodemon --watch cases/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace cases run deploy"
scripts.watch:cases.local: nodemon --watch cases/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace cases run deploy:local"
scripts.watch:activities: nodemon --watch activities/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace activities run deploy"
scripts.watch:activities.local: nodemon --watch activities/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace activities run deploy:local"
scripts.watch:request: nodemon --watch request/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace request run deploy"
scripts.watch:request.local: nodemon --watch request/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace request run deploy:local"
scripts.watch:usermanagement: nodemon --watch usermanagement/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace usermanagement run deploy"
scripts.watch:usermanagement.local: nodemon --watch usermanagement/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace usermanagement run deploy:local"
scripts.watch:casestructure: nodemon --watch casestructure/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace casestructure run deploy"
scripts.watch:casestructure.local: nodemon --watch casestructure/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace casestructure run deploy:local"
scripts.watch:gensettings: nodemon --watch gensettings/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace gensettings run deploy"
scripts.watch:gensettings.local: nodemon --watch gensettings/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace gensettings run deploy:local"
scripts.watch:knowledgearticle: nodemon --watch knowledgearticle/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace knowledgearticle run deploy"
scripts.watch:knowledgearticle.local: nodemon --watch knowledgearticle/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace knowledgearticle run deploy:local"
scripts.watch:services: nodemon --watch services/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace services run deploy"
scripts.watch:services.local: nodemon --watch services/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace services run deploy:local"
scripts.watch:ccms: nodemon --watch ccms/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace ccms run deploy"
scripts.watch:ccms.local: nodemon --watch ccms/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace ccms run deploy:local"
scripts.watch:container: nodemon --watch container/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace container run deploy"
scripts.watch:container.local: nodemon --watch container/src -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss,json --exec "npm --workspace container run deploy:local"
scripts.watch:all: concurrently --names "component,auth,customers,dashboard,cases,activities,request,knowledge,services,settings,ccms,container,casestructure,usermanagement,gensettings" "npm run watch:component" "npm run watch:auth" "npm run watch:customers" "npm run watch:dashboard" "npm run watch:cases" "npm run watch:activities" "npm run watch:request" "npm run watch:knowledgearticle" "npm run watch:services" "npm run watch:settings" "npm run watch:ccms" "npm run watch:usermanagement" "npm run watch:casestructure" "npm run watch:gensettings" "npm run watch:container"
scripts.watch:all.local: concurrently --names "component,auth,customers,dashboard,cases,activities,request,knowledge,services,settings,ccms,usermanagement,casestructure,container" "npm run watch:component.local" "npm run watch:auth.local" "npm run watch:customers.local" "npm run watch:dashboard.local" "npm run watch:cases.local" "npm run watch:activities.local" "npm run watch:request.local" "npm run watch:knowledgearticle.local" "npm run watch:services.local" "npm run watch:settings.local" "npm run watch:ccms.local" "npm run watch:usermanagement.local" "npm run watch:casestructure.local" "npm run watch:gensettings.local" "npm run watch:container.local"
scripts.install:all: concurrently "cd component && npm run build" "cd auth && npm run build" "cd customers && npm run build" "cd dashboard && npm run build" "cd cases && npm run build" "cd activities && npm run build" "cd request && npm run build" "cd knowledgearticle && npm run build" "cd services && npm run build" "cd settings && npm run build" "cd ccms && npm run build" "cd usermanagement && npm run build" "cd casestructure && npm run build" "cd gensettings && npm run build" "cd container && npm run build"
